name: AfterTanks!
description:
What's the goal of the game Tanks! ? Does it end at one point, or is it an endless battle? What if the tank has control of their afterlife, and decide what's next?

Blue Tank has to try their best to destroy Red Tank. In case of failure, Blue Tank will be send in limbo. As the Blue Tank walks around the environment, they encounter a building and may go explore inside. The building offers two exits, two choices. Blue Tank has to decide.

Controls

WASD keyboard, to navigate

Mouse, to move the camera (only in limbo)

Game by Mélina Lopez-Racine ( Press Kit )
